name: Michael Sembello
description:
'''Michael Andrew Sembello''' (born April 17, 1954) is an American singer, guitarist, keyboardist, songwriter, composer and producer from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

Sembello was nominated for an [[56th Academy Awards|Academy Award]] and a [[41st Golden Globe Awards|Golden Globe]] for his 1983 song "[[Maniac (Michael Sembello song)|Maniac]]", which he sang and co-wrote. The song reached number one in the United States and featured in the [[Flashdance (soundtrack)|''Flashdance'' film soundtrack]].
